title: Fernando Meza
text:
Fernando Nicolás Meza (born 21 March 1990 in <a href="San%20Mart%C3%ADn%2C%20Buenos%20Aires">San Martín</a>) is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who plays for <a href="Liga%20MX">Liga MX</a> club <a href="Club%20Necaxa">Necaxa</a>.
Career.
Meza made his league debut on 2 November 2008 in a 1-0 defeat to Boca Juniors aged 18.
In January 2009 Meza was selected to join the <a href="Argentina%20U-20">Argentina under-20</a> squad for the <a href="2009%20South%20American%20Youth%20Championship">2009 South American Youth Championship</a> in <a href="Venezuela">Venezuela</a>.
On January 10, 2020, Meza completed a transfer to <a href="Atlanta%20United%20FC">Atlanta United FC</a> of MLS, following a transfer to <a href="Club%20Tijuana">Club Tijuana</a> to complete a player swap with Atlanta for <a href="Leandro%20Gonz%C3%A1lez%20P%C3%ADrez">Leandro González Pírez</a>.
On February 18, 2021, Meza moved to <a href="Argentine%20Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">Argentine Primera División</a> side <a href="Defensa%20y%20Justicia">Defensa y Justicia</a>, on a loan deal.
After 7 league appearances for Defensa y Justicia, Atlanta United and Meza mutually terminated his contract on July 23, 2021. On the same day Meza signed with his former club <a href="Club%20Necaxa">Necaxa</a> in <a href="Liga%20MX">Liga MX</a>.
